archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.3.2c: c) reviewing the validity and effectiveness of information security measures following changes to systems, information security processes, procedures and controls or BCP, DR or CM management processes and solutions.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
